roleset.name: except something as preexisting and given

example.name: base on something taken for granted
example.text: They premise their marital decisions on the man's income.

example.name: Another example of based on a given
example.text: This article is concerned exclusively with a [legal basis *1] upon which [T *1][PRO] to premise the political decision.

roleset.note: PREMISE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from premise.01-v)
